DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
--exepcion 1: la relacion no esta dada directamente sobre el atributo convenio empresa porque depende del periodo, es por eso --que donde se usa clave convenio-periodo se reemplaza por convenio empresa update H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES set atributo_hijo = 'Convenio Empresa' where atributo_hijo = 'Clave Convenio-Periodo' --excepcion 2: la relacion interes comercial de la persona esta igual que lo de convenio update H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES set atributo_hijo = 'Marca Persona Interes Comercial' where atributo_hijo = 'Clave_Periodo-Afiliado-Persona'
--ACTUALIZAMOS LOS ID DE SCHEMA DE CADA OBJETO update H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES set id_atributo_padre = DA.id_atributo_schema from H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES RA join D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS DA on DA.nombre_atributo = RA.atributo_padre
update H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES set id_atributo_hijo = DA.id_atributo_schema from H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES RA join D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS DA on DA.nombre_atributo = RA.atributo_hijo
update H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES set id_tabla_atributo_hijo = DA.id_tabla_schema from H_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_RELACIONES RA join D_DOCUMENTACION_TABLAS DA on DA.nombre_tabla = RA.tabla_atributo_hijo

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Performs high-performance data extraction, transformation and loading;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

component.contactInfo: Conditional Split;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;0
component.description: Routes data rows to different outputs depending on the content of the data. Use conditions (SSIS expressions) to specify which rows are routed. For example, separate records that need to be cleaned from those that are ready to be loaded or route only a subset of records.
component.name: Conditional Split

input.description: Input to the Conditional Split Transformation
input.name: Conditional Split Input

inputColumn.lineageId: Package\Carga D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES\Flat File Source.Outputs[Flat File Source Output].Columns[XTZ]

output.description: Output 1 of the Conditional Split Transformation
output.name: Cargar

property.description: Specifies the expression. This expression version uses lineage identifiers instead of column names.
property.name: Expression

property.description: Specifies the friendly version of the expression. This expression version uses column names.
property.name: FriendlyExpression

property.description: Specifies the position of the condition in the list of conditions that the transformation evaluates. The evaluation order is from the lowest to the highest value.
property.name: EvaluationOrder

output.description: Default Output of the Conditional Split Transformation
output.name: Conditional Split Default Output

output.description: Error Output of the Conditional Split Transformation
output.name: Conditional Split Error Output

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server; (C) Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.

DTS:Executable.DTS:refId: Package\ID schema y borra lo que no tiene que verse
DTS:Executable.DTS:ObjectName: ID schema y borra lo que no tiene que verse

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
update D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES set id_atributo_schema = A.id_atributo_schema from D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES D join D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS A on A.nombre_atributo = D.nombre_atributo
delete D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES where id_representacion in ( select min(id_representacion) as id_borrar from D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES where id_atributo_schema is not null and categoria_representacion = 'ID' group by id_atributo_schema, categoria_representacion, nombre_atributo having count(id_representacion) >1)
update D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES set de_representacion = upper(trim(de_representacion))
--DELETE D_DOCUMENTACION_ATRIBUTOS_REPRESENTACIONES where id_atributo_schema IS NULL
